data.name: Kiss of the Revenant Reward Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Kiss of the Revenant Reward Pack is a set of 9 Shadow Bound weapons that give you 20% chance to summon a Revenant that will fight at your side and cast a Raven Blade (an attack that deals physical damage.)

Reward Park Includes:
Shadow-Bound Rifle
Shadow-Bound Blade
Shadow-Bound Blood Magic Focus
Shadow-Bound Chaos Focus
Shadow-Bound Pistols
Shadow-Bound Elementalism Focus
Shadow-Bound Fist Weapon
Shadow-Bound Hammer
Shadow-Bound Shotgun

Black Watchmen Hoodie
Black Watchmen Long Coat

5 AP Potions
5 SP Potions
Purified Weapon Distillate
Purified Talisman Distillate

data.short_description: The Kiss of the Revenant Reward Pack is a set of 9 Shadow Bound weapons that give you 20% chance to summon a Revenant that will fight at your side and cast a Raven Blade (an attack that deals physical damage.) The pack also comes with a unique Black Watchmen hoodie and a Trench Coat for your character!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (SP 1) / Vista (SP 1) / Windows 7 (SP 1)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHZ Intel Core 2 DUO or equivalent AMD CPU
  • Memory: At least 2GB RAM for Windows XP / 3GB Ram for Windows Vista and Windows 7
  • Hard Disk Space: At least 30GB of free space
  • Video Card: nVidia 8800 series 512 VRAM or better/Radeon HD3850 512MB or better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional: Requires account registration (free) with the developer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit is highly-recommended
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6GB
  • Hard Disk Space: At least 30GB of free space
  • Video Card: Nvidia GTX 560 Ti 1Gb
  • DirectX®: 11.0
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional: Requires account registration (free) with the developer.
